评论概述: I knew I would love this dress
评论详情: I ordered the dress in the green color in an XL. I knew I would love this dress just looking at it. Low and behold when I received it and tried it on, it fits perfectly. It's very comfortable and flattering even to those of us with a belly. It scrunches around the belly given a more flattering look. It fits very well hugging without showing everything. It's thin yet, it's not see through. It comes right under my knees length wise. I have larger arms and I am always pleased when dresses and tops fit my arms accordingly. This dress does this without causing me to go up in size making the rest of the dress too large and uncomfortable. This dress is perfect and I plan to get it in each color offered. I believe it's nice to be dressed down for a date night, it can be semi formal for an even and it can be worn to a formal event as well. It's so diverse without loosing its flattery.

Now this is my idea of the “little black dress”. The fit is true to size per the chart and the details are intentional and very flattering. There’s plenty of stretch throughout the waist and “skirt” and the ruching helps to conceal any midsection pudge. If you pair with your favorite shapewear you are sure to achieve an hour glass effect. This dress is bodycon done modestly with elegance and appeal!
Beautiful long sleeve dress made of super comfortable and shiny polyester. It is on the bigger side and not super flattering unless you are an in between size, then it’s great

I LOVE this dress and the way that it looks on my body. A couple things to keep in mind if you plan to order this dress:  1. If you are on the thicker side (like myself), you will need shapewear with this dress as it does show your lumps/bumps and curves. 2. Like another reviewer commented, I also ordered the blue dress and I did notice that the crisscross fabric over the chest, as well as the sleeves are a different color (and possibly different material) than the dress component itself.  Otherwise, when I get ready to wear this dress, I know I am going to look FLY in it!

I recently discovered Grace Karin and all I can say is “wow”. I rarely find a designer that so matches my individual style and makes me want every item in the collection. Even better, Grace Karin has excellent, comfortable and predictable sizing.  This dress is just gorgeous. I love the wine color, which just glimmers in the light. This jewel-toned dress is perfect for the upcoming holiday season and this shade of light red wine, not being evergreen or a tone associated with the holiday season, allows you even more options for wearing it.  I did not find a sharp color difference between the main body of the dress and the sleeves. I do not consider the sleeves sheer, as they are certainly thick enough for me to feel comfortable and warm while not wearing this dress with a blazer or a sweater over it. I did have to steam gently to remove the wrinkles, but the fabric blend itself makes that a breeze. It also did not wrinkle through the day, leaving you looking fresh and sharp.  I have never been disappointed by a Grace Karin design, and this is no exception. I always find items to be true to size and flattering. The ruching on this dress helps conceal any hip or tummy areas you may feel self-conscious about. I have had no issues with the neckline and have found that it drapes nicely. The size chart is always spot-on; if you are wavering on a size, I would choose to size down.  If you are on the fence over Grace Karin designs, take the jump. You won’t regret it.
Beautiful and lovely dress. Sexy and classic at the same time. It is the type of dress that you can wear to church, work, a date night. Go up a size if you are plus size.

I like everything about this perfect black dress. It truly is the ultimate perfect black dress. The fit is amazing, from its nice waist hourglass shape to the top detail. With the holidays upon us I was in need a few black dresses but needed them to be the perfect black dress. This is it! I am so glad to have this in my dress collection.  The size small fits as expected and is very true to size. The length of this dress is perfect, and I must say I absolutely love the sleeve and top detail and the different fabrics. It really adds to the making of this perfect black dress. A fashionista dream perfect black dress.
The dress fit perfectly! The color is beautiful and it hugs in the right places.

It came in a pouch very wrinkled.  The color and fabric are so soft and pretty.  It fits pretty well.  It could be a little smaller in the waist but it still fits just right in the shoulders and bust.  I love the length.  This would be a nice wedding guest dress or any semi formal event.

I got this for my wife as she has to wear a lot of dresses for work. The dress itself is made of a very light and thin material. You almost have to be extremely fit to not have any bulging appear. The ruffle in the midsection hides a tad bit of belly but not much. The chest area is a bit awkwardly shaped with the mesh. If you have a big chest like she does, it extra fabric at the chest sits out weirdly on the sides. The length is great as it is appropriate for the office. The color is great, too, for the season. The feel of the dress is okay. It's comfortable to wear but not anything where it's soft and thick and silky-feeling.

评论概述: Fan of Grace Karin and this pretty dress!
评论详情: I am really becoming a fan of the designs of Grace Karin! This Grace Karin dress is no exception. I am a fan of this lovely magenta color. I love the loose sleeves and the slight puffiness at the shoulders. It’s a great length for me since I am only 5’2. It fits true to size. This is a wonderful dress I can wear to work, church or special occasions. Plus, it’s affordable. I’m very pleased with this beautiful dress and I highly recommend it to others.
Not a bad dress. The arm length and body fit was good. The wife liked the fit. She got the Lg. She 5 ft Aprox 120 lbs. Just follow the size chart for the bust and waist, seems right.

评论概述: The Difference in Fabric/Shades is Noticeable
评论详情: Straight out of the bag this dress was off for me.  First, you cannot tell from the listing photos but the front drape on the bust of this dress and the sleeves are a different fabric and color than the rest of the dress. The bodice of the dress is a knit and the drape/sleeves are a sheer material. And the color difference is quite noticeable in certain lighting. The fabric overall is not bad just seems like a patchwork with the varying materials and shades of blue. I think I would have almost preferred the 2 fabrics being 2 completely different colors.  This dress was pretty easy to steam. Only a few minutes or so. The zipper glides easily.  I do like the fit though and the way it looks. The dress hugs the body and flatters curves without being too tight or revealing. The sleeves are a little short for me. I ordered the Small and I am 5'10, 125 lbs, 32-26-35, 24" long arms for reference.  If you’re not bothered by the shading difference then this is a great dress.
